english: What are your problems and symptoms?
cantonese:
Nei5 jau5 mat1 je5 Man6 tai4
zing3 zong6
characters:
你有乜嘢問題
症狀?

cantonese:
Nei5 jau5 mou5 jam6 ho4 dei6
fong1 gok3 dak1 tung3?
characters: 你有冇任何地方覺得疼?

english:
Where does it hurt?
Continuous or Intermittent?
cantonese:
Tung3 hai2 bin1 dou6?
Ci4 zuk6
Dyun6 dyun6 zuk6 zuk6
characters:
痛喺邊度？
持續定係斷斷續續？

english:
Sharp pain
Burning pain
Dull pain
Throbbing pain
cantonese:
Zam1 ci3 tung3
Coek3 jit6 tung3
Jam1 jam1 tung3
Tiu3 dung6 tung3
characters:
針刺痛?
焯熱痛?
陰陰痛？
跳動痛？

english:
What makes your pain
Better?
Worse?
cantonese:
Jau5 mat1 je3 ling6 nei5 ge3 tung3
Hou2 di1
Waai6 di1
characters:
有乜嘢令你嘅痛
好啲?
壞啲?

english:
Does the pain go anywhere else?
Where?
cantonese:
Tung3 wui2 m4 wui2 heoi3 dou3 kei4 taa1 dei6 fong1?
Bin1 dou6?
characters:
痛會唔會去到其他地方？
邊度？

english: Have you had any pain in __?

cantonese: Nei5 ji5 cin4 jau5 mou5 ni1 di1 cing5 fong3?

english: On a scale from 1 to 10, what is your level of pain?
cantonese: Jat1 zi6 sap6: nei5 tung3 ge3 cing4 dou6 hai6 mat1?
characters: 一至十：你痛嘅程度係乜？
